## OnePasswordBackend class

1Password backend via `op` CLI.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class OnePasswordBackend implements SecretBackend 
```
**Implements:** [SecretBackend](./vaultkeeper.secretbackend.md)

## Remarks

Requires the 1Password CLI (`op`<!-- -->) to be installed and authenticated. Secrets are stored as Password items in the default vault or a configured vault.
